name: Deadlift
text: Arguably deadlift is the king of all exercises, the deadlift hits every major muscle group hard, and is perhaps the greatest test of strength there is. Because of all the muscles involved.

name: Back squat
text: Just like the deadlift, the barbell back squat hits just about every major muscle group there is in the body and is the king of leg-developing movements.

name: Bench Press
text: Every gym-goer in the world has been asked “Whaddya bench?” at least once. This move is responsible for developing powerful, well-defined pecs, shoulders.

name: Dumbbell romanian deadlift
text: This could be the most important exercise there is for lower-back health and developing an impressive set of glutes.Any seasoned lifter will tell you they’re truly impressed by a good set of legs.

name: Kettlebell swing
text: Often confused as a squat and front raise combo for the legs and shoulders, respectively, this move is actually an explosive hip hinge, great for the glutes and conditioning egs and shoulders.

name: Suspended pushup
text: In a pushup, the instability of the handles leads to more muscle fiber activation, in turn leading to more strength and muscle development in less time than in other variations of the classic pushup.
